creator: xpresitnet@juno.com
text:
Apache Web Server can not find php4apache.dll and it *IS* there and the paths 
are correct. I searched the net and alot of other people are having this 
problem, but no one seems to have an answer. Please fix.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
The first point: Apache 1.3.23 is a little bit outdated. You may try the current
1.3.27 and see if the problem still exists.

Second: Could you please post the relevant information (configuration, php
version, paths, error messages)? Otherwise it's not possible to reproduce your
problem.

Thanks.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
No further response. Assuming issue resolved.

Please reopen the bug if this is not the case and you can provide additional
information.

Thanks for using Apache.
